archiefmat.titel: Brieven van prins Hendrik aan zijn vader
archiefmat.titel_eng: Correspondence of Prince Hendrik sent to his father
archiefmat.scope: Concerning the visit of prince Hendrik (1820-1879) to the Netherlands West Indies, inter alia a letter from Curaçao, 1 July 1835.
archiefmat.notes:
Only approved consultation permitted.

Concerning the visit of prince Hendrik to the Netherlands West Indies, inter alia a letter from Curaçao, 1 July 1835. See also A43 (archive of prince Hendrik, Prince of the Netherlands (1820-1879)), no. IIB-265.
